body.group:
You must agree with our Terms of Service You must agree with our Terms of Service Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.
Upload failed Upload failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed - (String as short as possible).
Select file(s) failed Select file(s) failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed - (String as short as possible).
Malformed e-mail. Please try again. Malformed e-mail. Please try again. Message of the dialog displayed when the user types a malformed email address.
E-mail is not associated with a MEGA account or wrong password. Please try again. E-mail is not associated with a MEGA account or wrong password. Please try again. Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to login with an e-mail that is not associated with a MEGA account or type a wrong password. Preserve the MEGA word in uppercase.
Delete item? Delete item? Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).
Account upgraded Account upgraded Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Error getting payment methods Error getting payment methods Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed - (String as short as possible).
Retrieving payment Url failed Retrieving payment Url failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed - (String as short as possible).
Contact added Contact added Title of the dialog displayed when add a contact successfully - (String as short as possible).
Contact added successful Contact added successful Message of the dialog displayed when add a contact successfully.
Add contact failed Add contact failed Title of the dialog displayed when the the process to add a contact failed - (String as short as possible).
Failed to add the contact: [{0}] Failed to add the contact: [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the the process to add a contact failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Background agents disabled Background agents disabled Title of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application
Auto Camera Uploads prerequisites Auto Camera Uploads prerequisites Title of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.
In order for the automatic Camera Uploads to work correctly, you need to enable the option "Stay logged in". Do you want to enable this option? In order for the automatic Camera Uploads to work correctly, you need to enable the option "Stay logged in". Do you want to enable this option? Message of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.
Background agents for MEGA have been disabled by the user Background agents for MEGA have been disabled by the user Message of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

Failed to retrieve the payment Url. Please try again. [{0}] Failed to retrieve the payment Url. Please try again. [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Failed to retrieve the available payment methods. Please try again. [{0}] Failed to retrieve the available payment methods. Please try again. [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Account successfully upgraded! Account successfully upgraded! Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully.
Upgrade account failed Upgrade account failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed - (String as short as possible).
The operation has not finished correctly. The credit card will not be charged. The operation has not finished correctly. The credit card will not be charged. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed.
Please type a feedback message for us. Thanks. Please type a feedback message for us. Thanks. Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.
Cancel Subscription Cancel Subscription Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).
Subscription cancelled Subscription cancelled Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
The subscription has been canceled correctly. The subscription has been canceled correctly. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.
Cancel subscription failed Cancel subscription failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).
The subscription has not been canceled correctly. Please contact support@mega.co.nz to cancel your subscription. The subscription has not been canceled correctly. Please contact support@mega.co.nz to cancel your subscription. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.
Thank you for your feedback!
Are you sure you want to cancel your Mega subscription? Thank you for your feedback!
Are you sure you want to cancel your Mega subscription? Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking for confirmation to do it.
You are about to cancel your Mega subscription. Please let us know, if there is anything we can do to help change your mind. You are about to cancel your Mega subscription. Please let us know, if there is anything we can do to help change your mind. Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.
Wrong data format Wrong data format Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).
The Credit Card Number, Month, Year and CVV should be numbers. Please, check that the filled data are correct and try again. The Credit Card Number, Month, Year and CVV should be numbers. Please, check that the filled data are correct and try again. Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.
Please fill in all the required fields and try again. Please fill in all the required fields and try again. Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.
Storing credit card failed Storing credit card failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).
The credit card information is not correct. The credit card will not be charged. The credit card information is not correct. The credit card will not be charged. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.
Shortcut error Shortcut error Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).
An error occurred when try to open a shortcut. Maybe it is an invalid shortcut or the destiny folder was deleted. An error occurred when try to open a shortcut. Maybe it is an invalid shortcut or the destiny folder was deleted. Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut.
Save settings failed Save settings failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed - (String as short as possible).
Failed to save settings. Please, try again [{0}] Failed to save settings. Please, try again [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

Failed to capture video. Please, try again [{0}] Failed to capture video. Please, try again [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

Failed to retrieve your user data. Please try again. [{0}] Failed to retrieve your user data. Please try again. [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Are you sure you want to permanent delete {0}? Are you sure you want to permanent delete {0}? Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include name of the node to be removed in runtime.
Failed to select file(s). Please, try again [{0}] Failed to select file(s). Please, try again [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Failed to upload file. Please try again. [{0}] Failed to upload file. Please try again. [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Select folder failed Select folder failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).
Failed to select folder. Please, try again or select another folder: [{0}] Failed to select folder. Please, try again or select another folder: [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
yes, export yes, export Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).
Download options Download options Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).
no, only local no, only local Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).
Memory Limit Memory Limit Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).
Not enough free memory space to complete this operation. The app will shutdown now. Not enough free memory space to complete this operation. The app will shutdown now. Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.
Cache cleared Cache cleared Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.
Cache has been succesfully cleared Cache has been succesfully cleared Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.
PIN lock too short PIN lock too short Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).
PIN lock must be at least 4 digits. PIN lock must be at least 4 digits. Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.
Masterkey copied Masterkey copied Title of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).
Masterkey copied to clipboard Masterkey copied to clipboard Message of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.
Current PIN lock no match Current PIN lock no match Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.
Current PIN lock is not correct or does not match Current PIN lock is not correct or does not match Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.
Clipboard failed Clipboard failed Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).
Failed to copy masterkey to clipboard. Please try again Failed to copy masterkey to clipboard. Please try again Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.
Unauthorized access Unauthorized access Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).
You don't have permission to copy this file type into the destination folder. Probably you are trying to save/copy into a SD card a file of an unsupported type. Please, try to save/copy the file into the your device internal memory. You don't have permission to copy this file type into the destination folder. Probably you are trying to save/copy into a SD card a file of an unsupported type. Please, try to save/copy the file into the your device internal memory. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).
Copy file failed Copy file failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).
Failed to copy the selected file: [{0}] Failed to copy the selected file: [{0}] Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Logged out Logged out Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).
Preparing file failed Preparing file failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).
Failed to prepare file: {0} for upload. Failed to prepare file: {0} for upload. Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.
You have not selected a default download location for your files.
To proceed with the download please select a destination folder or go to preferences in order to set up your default download location. You have not selected a default download location for your files.
To proceed with the download please select a destination folder or go to preferences in order to set up your default download location. Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.
Overquota Alert! Overquota Alert! Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).
Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account? Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account? Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.
You have been logged out on this device from another location You have been logged out on this device from another location Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).
PIN lock codes do not match PIN lock codes do not match Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).
Your PIN lock codes do not match. Please re-type them and make sure they are equal. Your PIN lock codes do not match. Please re-type them and make sure they are equal. Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

Please select minimal 1 picture for upload. Please select minimal 1 picture for upload. Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.
Resume failed Resume failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.
Failed to resume transfers. Failed to resume transfers. Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.
Pause failed Pause failed Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed - (String as short as possible).

Do you want to automatic export IMAGE files to your photo album after download? You can change this setting on the settings page afterwards. Other file types will only be stored in the local storage of the app. Do you want to automatic export IMAGE files to your photo album after download? You can change this setting on the settings page afterwards. Other file types will only be stored in the local storage of the app. Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.
Download count Download count Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).
You have selected over {0} items ({0}) to download. Do you want to proceed? You have selected over {0} items ({0}) to download. Do you want to proceed? Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the ({0}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.
Wrong password Wrong password Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).
The typed password is incorrect. The typed password is incorrect. Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password.
Account already confirmed Account already confirmed Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).
The account is already confirmed. You can now login. The account is already confirmed. You can now login. Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.
Pending Transfers Pending Transfers Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit - (String as short as possible).
You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to exit? You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to exit? Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.
Pending Transfers Pending Transfers Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout - (String as short as possible).

Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.
